actions.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Elementary, Secondary and Vocational Education.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Elementary, Secondary, and Vocational Education

official_title: Expressing the sense of the Congress that federally funded school lunches should provide optional meatless meals.

summary.text: Expresses the sense of the Congress that federally funded school lunch programs should provide nutritious meatless meals for students who conscientiously believe such meals to be best for themselves.

titles.title: Expressing the sense of the Congress that federally funded school lunches should provide optional meatless meals.
